languages.text: {n}Друзья Джай выглядят именно так, как и должны — прожженными дельцами хладного торга, одетыми угрожающе, но с шиком, свойственным любителям прогуляться по грани закона. Среди них выделяются мужчина и женщина — близнецы, одинаково схожие и различные между собой. Мужчина обладает живой мимикой и шальным взглядом, девушка же холодна, спокойна и кажется немного сонной.{/n}

{n}Jae's friends look exactly as you would expect — like hardened operators of the Cold Trade, arrayed in the forbidding but glitzy style common to those who like to skirt the limits of the law. One pair in particular catches your eye — a young man and woman, twins, it seems, identical yet distinct from each other. The man has a lively face and a crazed look in his eye, while the woman is cold and calm, and seems slightly drowsy.{/n}

languages.text: {n}婕伊的朋友们看起来与你想象得完全一样，都是那种从事冷市贸易的典型走私者。他们穿着那种不合法规的华丽服饰，那些跨越法律禁区的人常会穿这样的衣服。在参加聚会的人里，两个人吸引了你的注意。那是一对年轻男女，似乎是一对双胞胎。他们看起来似乎一模一样，但又彼此不同。男人表情活泼，眼神疯狂，而女人一脸平静，似乎还有些昏昏欲睡。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's friends look exactly as you would expect — like hardened operators of the Cold Trade, arrayed in the forbidding but glitzy style common to those who like to skirt the limits of the law. One pair in particular catches your eye — a young man and woman, twins, it seems, identical yet distinct from each other. The man has a lively face and a crazed look in his eye, while the woman is cold and calm, and seems slightly drowsy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊的朋友们看起来与你想象得完全一样，都是那种从事冷市贸易的典型走私者。他们穿着那种不合法规的华丽服饰，那些跨越法律禁区的人常会穿这样的衣服。在参加聚会的人里，两个人吸引了你的注意。那是一对年轻男女，似乎是一对双胞胎。他们看起来似乎一模一样，但又彼此不同。男人表情活泼，眼神疯狂，而女人一脸平静，似乎还有些昏昏欲睡。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ジェイの友人たちは、まさにあなたが予想したとおりの風貌をしていた。ジェイの熟練オペレーターにありがちな、法の制限をかいくぐるのが好きな連中によく見られるような、威圧的だがきらびやかなスタイルに身を包んでいる。特に目を引くのが若い男女のペアだ。双子のようで、一卵性双生児でありながら、互いに異なる個性を放っている。男のほうは生き生きとした顔立ちで、狂気じみた目つきをしているが、女のほうは落ち着いており、少し眠たげでもある。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's friends look exactly as you would expect — like hardened operators of the Cold Trade, arrayed in the forbidding but glitzy style common to those who like to skirt the limits of the law. One pair in particular catches your eye — a young man and woman, twins, it seems, identical yet distinct from each other. The man has a lively face and a crazed look in his eye, while the woman is cold and calm, and seems slightly drowsy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイの友人たちは、まさにあなたが予想したとおりの風貌をしていた。ジェイの熟練オペレーターにありがちな、法の制限をかいくぐるのが好きな連中によく見られるような、威圧的だがきらびやかなスタイルに身を包んでいる。特に目を引くのが若い男女のペアだ。双子のようで、一卵性双生児でありながら、互いに異なる個性を放っている。男のほうは生き生きとした顔立ちで、狂気じみた目つきをしているが、女のほうは落ち着いており、少し眠たげでもある。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los amigos de Jae tienen el aspecto que cabría esperar. Son agentes avezados del Comercio Frío, con el estilo imponente pero ostentoso de quienes viven al margen de la ley. Una pareja en concreto te llama la atención: un hombre y una mujer jóvenes de aspecto idéntico pero distinto. Parecen ser gemelos. El hombre tiene un aspecto vivaracho y algo de locura en la mirada, mientras que la mujer parece fría, tranquila y un tanto somnolienta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's friends look exactly as you would expect — like hardened operators of the Cold Trade, arrayed in the forbidding but glitzy style common to those who like to skirt the limits of the law. One pair in particular catches your eye — a young man and woman, twins, it seems, identical yet distinct from each other. The man has a lively face and a crazed look in his eye, while the woman is cold and calm, and seems slightly drowsy.{/n}

Una pareja en concreto te llama la atención: un hombre y una mujer jóvenes de aspecto idéntico pero distinto. Parecen ser gemelos. El hombre tiene un aspecto vivaracho y algo de locura en la mirada, mientras que la mujer parece fría, tranquila y un tanto somnolienta.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les amis de Jae sont exactement comme vous les imaginiez : des agents endurcis du Commerce Froid, arborant le style aussi bien menaçant que clinquant de ceux qui aiment contourner les limites de la loi. Un jeune couple en particulier retient votre attention : un homme et une femme, visiblement jumeaux, à la fois identiques et bien distincts. Lui possède un visage enjoué et un regard un peu fou, tandis qu'elle est froide et posée, avec la mine légèrement endormie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's friends look exactly as you would expect — like hardened operators of the Cold Trade, arrayed in the forbidding but glitzy style common to those who like to skirt the limits of the law. One pair in particular catches your eye — a young man and woman, twins, it seems, identical yet distinct from each other. The man has a lively face and a crazed look in his eye, while the woman is cold and calm, and seems slightly drowsy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les amis de Jae sont exactement comme vous les imaginiez : des agents endurcis du Commerce Froid, arborant le style aussi bien menaçant que clinquant de ceux qui aiment contourner les limites de la loi. Un jeune couple en particulier retient votre attention : un homme et une femme, visiblement jumeaux, à la fois identiques et bien distincts. Lui possède un visage enjoué et un regard un peu fou, tandis qu'elle est froide et posée, avec la mine légèrement endormie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jaes Freunde sehen genau so aus, wie man es erwarten würde – wie hartgesottene Kalthandeloperatoren. Mit ihrer bedrohlichen, aber dennoch schillernden Kleidung tragen sie genau den Stil, den man von Leuten gewohnt ist, die gerne das Gesetz umgehen. Besonders sticht dir dabei ein Paar ins Auge – ein junger Mann und eine junge Frau, Zwillinge wie es scheint, identisch und doch verschieden. Der Mann hat ein lebhaftes Gesicht und einen wahnsinnigen Blick, die Frau hingegen ist kalt und ruhig und wirkt fast schon schlaftrunken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's friends look exactly as you would expect — like hardened operators of the Cold Trade, arrayed in the forbidding but glitzy style common to those who like to skirt the limits of the law. The man has a lively face and a crazed look in his eye, while the woman is cold and calm, and seems slightly drowsy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jaes Freunde sehen genau so aus, wie man es erwarten würde – wie hartgesottene Kalthandeloperatoren. Mit ihrer bedrohlichen, aber dennoch schillernden Kleidung tragen sie genau den Stil, den man von Leuten gewohnt ist, die gerne das Gesetz umgehen. Besonders sticht dir dabei ein Paar ins Auge – ein junger Mann und eine junge Frau, Zwillinge wie es scheint, identisch und doch verschieden. Der Mann hat ein lebhaftes Gesicht und einen wahnsinnigen Blick, die Frau hingegen ist kalt und ruhig und wirkt fast schon schlaftrunken.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jae'ın arkadaşları tam da tahmin ettiğin gibiler, yani kanunların koyduğu sınırları aşmayı sevenlerin haşin ancak gösterişli tarzında giyinmiş, tecrübeli Soğuk Ticaret işletmecileri gibi. Bir ikili, özellikle gözüne takılıyor. Genç bir adam ve bir kadın. İkiz gibi tıpatıp birbirlerine benziyorlar ancak aynı zamanda bambaşkalar. Adamın canlı bir yüzü ve delice bakışları varken kadın ise soğuk, sakin ve görünüşe göre biraz da uykulu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's friends look exactly as you would expect — like hardened operators of the Cold Trade, arrayed in the forbidding but glitzy style common to those who like to skirt the limits of the law. One pair in particular catches your eye — a young man and woman, twins, it seems, identical yet distinct from each other. The man has a lively face and a crazed look in his eye, while the woman is cold and calm, and seems slightly drowsy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae'ın arkadaşları tam da tahmin ettiğin gibiler, yani kanunun sınırlarının uçlarında gezmeyi sevenlerin haşin ancak gösterişli tarzında giyinmiş, tecrübeli Soğuk Ticaret işletmecileri gibi. Bir ikili özellikle gözüne takılıyor. Genç bir adam ve bir kadın. İkiz gibi tıpatıp birbirlerine benziyorlar ancak aynı zamanda bambaşkalar. Adamın canlı bir yüzü ve delice bakışları varken; kadın soğuk, sakin ve görünüşe göre biraz da uykulu.{/n}
